name: Triiaze
description:
TRIIAZE

"You were transported to to another world due to the influence of an unknown entity.

The only thing you remember is KILL, RESCUE and SURVIVE."

Triiaze is a game developed for MasterD GameJam, MasterJam, where you progress through the levels by rescuing robots and escaping through an escape hatch, while being chased by ghosts and confused by the maze itself.

Known issues:

  • There's a small chance that you may cause your character to go through the walls, just restart the game.
  • There's a small chance you might die after hiting the play button and the mouse gets stuck in the middle of the screen. If that happens, restart the game.
  • While in game there is no way to go back to the main menu. Just restart the game.
  • Main menu title is wrong. Will change eventually.
  • Credits don't show the next page for the used assets. I'll display them here for now.

Credits for the assets used:

  • Humble Fonts Free by somepx
  • Hand Painted Tile Textures by beefpuppy
  • Footsteps - Essentials by Nox_Sound
  • RPG BGM - Lobby by B. G. M.
  • RPG BGM - Dungeon by B. G. M.

If I'm forgetting someone, please let me now!
